### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it, as some tiles may be occupied by other entities or unplaceable due to terrain features like water.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces.

### Errors when crafting entities
- Ensure you have the required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft entities.

### Errors when refueling entities
- Make sure you have the required fuel in your inventory before attempting to refuel entities.

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure you have the required science packs in your inventory before attempting to research technologies.

### Errors when connecting entities to power infrastructure
- Ensure the entity is compatible with the power infrastructure and that the power infrastructure is properly set up before attempting to connect the entity.
